data.text: In 2019, we sent 1,175 tonnes of food waste from our kitchens and canteens to O∙PARK1, the first organic resources recovery centre in Hong Kong. This waste is then converted through anaerobic digestion into biogas for electricity generation. https://t.co/Bu4EuEKNhu
@historiously Hi there, mind providing us your eTicket number and full name through DM for checking please? - Anna https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@a_edwards519 Yes, you may transit in Hong Kong if you meet all the requirements.
@a_edwards519 If your return journey is transiting through other city, you have to check for their travel restrictions for your return way. -Joy
@a_edwards519 Passengers are able to transit in Hong Kong if the whole journey (two one way flights) booked under one booking. -Joy

@a_edwards519 They have their baggage checked through to the final destination
They have been issued their onward boarding pass(es) from their origin and
The connection time between flights is within 24 hours.  
-Elsa

data.text:
@a_edwards519 Passengers will be able to transit through Hong Kong if:
Their itinerary is contained in a single booking
They meet the entry requirements of their final destination
 -Elsa
@DhairyaSachdev Hi there. Mind providing us more details like your destination through DM for checking please? Thank you. - Anna https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@VictoriaHolida8 If the flights do not show up on the website, we are afraid that the flights are fulled already. Thanks for your understanding. - Liz

urls.title: Online Flight Booking | Airfare | United States - Cathay Pacific
urls.description: Book flights to Hong Kong, Manila, Bangkok, Cebu, Vancouver and other destinations with Cathay Pacific. You can also manage bookings and view your frequent flyer account online.

data.text:
@VictoriaHolida8 Hi there, we are sorry that there is no flight on 14jul from KUL to HKG. 
Check out our available flights and fares on our website https://t.co/wa5i1xZJLr! This will be the easiest way for you to get the latest fares and make a booking.  - Liz
@Fran_Diaz_R93 If certain destination requires visa to entry, you are required to hold valid visa / travel document which fulfills the entry requirement. -Vinci

@Fran_Diaz_R93 All boarding passes will be issued if passenger: 
1. Having confirmed booking connecting to AC transit in YVR in the same day 
2. Holding valid visa 
3. Applied ETA for YVR transit 
-Joy
See more in our 2019 Sustainability Report: https://t.co/Kn3vJjAeoN https://t.co/JtgEBr5nNU

In 2019, we reduced our environmental impact by welcoming 6 new A350s, which can improve fuel efficiency by up to 25%. 33,922 tonnes of CO2 were also offset through our carbon offset programme, equating to the carbon sequestration of 28,000 football pitches' worth of forests!

@Fran_Diaz_R93 May we confirm that you would like to make the booking separately? Under the current transit requirements in Hong Kong, passenger itinerary need to be contained in one single booking. Otherwise, passengers are not permitted to transit through Hong Kong. -Joy
@Fran_Diaz_R93 Hi there, please send us DM with your eTicket number and passenger's full name for checking
@kaisekudoki The policy is implemented by the Hong Kong government. If you have any concerns, you may contact the local government officials. - Chloe

data.text: @ohYeahbutz Hi Jonny, in this first phase, transiting to and from destinations in Mainland China is not available at the Hong Kong International Airport. You are advised to wait a bit and refer to our latest announcement here https://t.co/xImZXQzYj7  - Holly

For the first time ever, we removed some seats from our B777 to increase cargo capacity by 12 tonnes so as to meet global shipping demand! To ensure that the goods are delivered safely, we even have cabin crew as cargo marshals looking after the goods during the flight! https://t.co/BRRej4FdXs

data.text: @Singh_3500 Hi there, sorry for the overlook! Flight from Delhi to San Francisco will resume on 31july. You may check for the available flight on our website https://t.co/wa5i1xZJLr ! :)  - Liz
@Singh_3500 Hi there, flights from Delhi has been suspended until further notice. You may keep an eye on our website for the latest update. Thanks for your understanding! - Liz
@viveklulla @AsiaMiles Hi Vivek, mind letting us know your membership number, full name and email address through DM please? Thank you. - Anna https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

As an airline, we appreciate both the beauty and function of bridges, because just like us, they connect people and places. We especially admire cleverly designed bridges that are also pleasing to the eye. What are some of your favourite bridges? Let us know in the comments. https://t.co/JO0jpSvRGT
@EngelreyA You may check out our refunds policy here: https://t.co/CtScvaepCR - Chloe

data.text: Despite the difficulties of COVID-19, we’ve continued our dedication to developing all aspects of the Cathay experience sustainably. To learn more about our ongoing efforts to reduce our environmental impact, check out our 2019 Sustainability Report at https://t.co/pv5c67sLBz https://t.co/MLxGBIFuJV
@Zalasta Hi there. We are sorry to let you down. Mind letting us know more details through DM please? Thank you. - Anna https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@prashantkrathor @indianBTSstan You may also check the flight status at https://t.co/INGJZOgDip 4 days in prior to your flight departure. -Joy
@JacksandCrowns @jpcathaypacific Maximum 2 pieces, 30kg in total. -Joy
@zang_bao 目前還不行呢，不好意思  -Vinci
@LochnaPant Mind sending us DM with the passenger full name and 13-digit eTicket number so we can have a look? -Vinci https://t.co/6IweuRkR51

urls.title: Online Flight Booking | Airfare | United States - Cathay Pacific
urls.description: Book flights to Hong Kong, Manila, Bangkok, Cebu, Vancouver and other destinations with Cathay Pacific. You can also manage bookings and view your frequent flyer account online.

data.text: @lees007 Please ask your first airline carrier for further assist -Elsa
@lees007 May we know did you get your boarding pass for tonight's flight? -Elsa

@lees007 Hi Lisa, as mentioned yesterday, you will need to pick up your baggage by your own and check in again in our check in counter, we are unable to assist you to check through your baggage, since there is no interline agreement. Thank you -Elsa
@rajendrsrathore Would you try clear the cookies and cache of your browsers and try again? You are also advised to send us a DM for further inquiries. Thank you. - Liz https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

@rajendrsrathore We are unable to guarantee the flights will not be cancelled at the moment. We will keep monitor the situation. In case the flights got cancelled by us, we will help to arrange another flight for you. Thanks for your understanding!  - Liz

@rajendrsrathore You may try on this link :) https://t.co/TlJEZgVoLK We have inputted the departure and arrival airport for you. Flights will resume on 3July so we put 3Jul as the departure date in the link :) - Liz
@rajendrsrathore You may edit the departure date under "departing on" for searching :)  - Liz
@rajendrsrathore Hi there, we are operating 3 flights weekly in July. You may refer to our latest flight timetable here https://t.co/FuLqtm5Vg6 - Holly
@JacksandCrowns @jpcathaypacific Hi there, if you are booking with economy class, you are entitle with 30 KG (max two pieces) for your baggage -Elsa
@Nicky_Treasure Hi Nicola, we are so sorry about that, would you mind to DM us your booking reference, eticket number, full name and email address, so that we can check -Elsa

The Dragon Boat Festival is a colourful day with a rich history, celebrated with many fun activities like eating rice dumplings, balancing eggs, and racing dragon boats. Do you know what are the different crew positions in a #dragonboat?

📸IG@tjfoo_ https://t.co/P8XXmS4GQn

@sithlordcal Items exceeding stated amounts should be packed into your checked bags. The total net quantity must not exceed 2kg or 2L per passenger, and the net quantity of each single item must not exceed 0.5kg or 0.5L. https://t.co/TkTyWJM1AR (2/2) - Liz

@sithlordcal Hi there, you may bring liquids, aerosols, and gels in your cabin luggage as long as they do not exceed a maximum volume of 100ml for each item. These should be carried in one resealable, transparent plastic bag no more than 1L in capacity per passenger. (1/2) - Liz
@nondiscursive @AsianaAirlines Hi there, we are so sorry to hear that, would you mind to DM us for your eticket number, full name, email address, so that we can check for you -Elsa
@Raviapc Hi there, you may check out our latest flight timetable here https://t.co/FuLqtm5Vg6 - Holly

Across the Pasig River from the world's oldest Chinatown lies Intramuros, one of Manila's oldest districts. The coastal city is also one of our oldest destinations (we've flown there since 1946 - the year we were founded!)

Can you spot the 5 differences between these 2 shots? https://t.co/biEe64qwJ6
@LochnaPant Mind sharing your eTicket no and full name in DM for our checking? - Chloe https://t.co/6IweuRkR51
@SwitzerNYC We recommend you to check with the operating carrier (i.e. AA) for their advice. -Vinci

data.text: There are over 1,000 #windmills in the #Netherlands, which have been used for pumping water, sawing wood and grinding grains. Kinderdijk, which is a 1.5hr drive from #Amsterdam, has 19 windmills. Can you catch one of them as it zooms past? Share your screenshot in the comments! https://t.co/pIsDD4TdO6
@NelsonCidra You're welcome and you too :)! - Chloe
@NelsonCidra The soonest flight available will be in August. - Chloe
@JaxonBalisi @Cleartrip If your ticket was issued with travel agent, the refund process will be handled by them directly. We recommend you to contact your agent for follow-up. -Vinci
@JournoDannyAero @evansummerfield Time flies! It's already 2 years ago. -Vinci
